title.narrative: SAHARA - Inspiration & knowledge sharing Tour Egypt

description.narrative: The annual agriculture-focused Sahara trade fair is taking place in September (12-15), in Cairo and the EKN is eager to facilitate a 3-day tailor-made matchmaking & knowledge-sharing between Dutch companies and Egyptian agribusiness companies, aimed at increasing sustainable and inclusive agribusiness in Egypt.The 3-day Study, Inspiration and Knowledge sharing tour -connected to the Sahara fair- will be a post-covid start for building and re-energizing contacts for Dutch stakeholders interested in contributing to sustainable and inclusive agribusiness in Egypt. For stakeholders in Egypt, the introductions following from this chain of events will provide access to new technologies and advisory services related to sustainable and inclusive agribusiness.Ultimately, the initiative should lead to more Dutch investments in sustainable and inclusive agribusiness, generating meaning full jobs for Egyptian men and women, national income and lasting people to people and business to business relations between the Netherlands and a stable, prosperous, inclusive and sustainable Egypt.
